Question: At the bottom of the ladder, this person said "I'm going to step off the LEM now" (referring to the Apollo Lunar Module).
Hints: During the Apollo 11 launch, this person's heart reached a top rate of 110 beats per minute.
Based on the normal crew rotation scheme, this person would command Apollo 11.
On the second landing, they became stuck and according to this person, Yeager was in fits of laughter.
